scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-essential
scripts.build-essential: npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('public/styles', {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('src/styles/main.css', 'public/styles/main.css'); try { fs.copyFileSync('src/index.html', 'public/index.html'); } catch(e) { console.log('Note: index.html not found in src/'); } console.log('✅ Assets copied');"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch-client" "npm run watch-server" "npm run serve"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); ['dist','public'].forEach(d => { try { fs.rmSync(d, {recursive:true, force:true}); } catch(e) {} });"
scripts.deploy-github: npm run build && echo 'Push to GitHub and enable Pages'
scripts.deploy-help:
node -e "console.log('Available deployment options:
1. npm run deploy-vercel
2. npm run deploy-netlify
3. npm run deploy-surge
4. npm run deploy-github')"
scripts.build-github: npm run clean && npm run build-client && npm run copy-assets && npm run create-gh-pages
scripts.create-gh-pages: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('docs', {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('public/index.html', 'docs/index.html'); fs.copyFileSync('public/bundle.js', 'docs/bundle.js'); fs.copyFileSync('public/styles/main.css', 'docs/styles/main.css'); fs.mkdirSync('docs/styles', {recursive:true}); console.log('✅ GitHub Pages files created in docs/ folder');"
scripts.deploy-github-pages: npm run build-github && git add docs/ && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push origin main
